snippet: AARON--Daniel. The American Academy of Arts and Letters notes with sorrow the death of this incisive, thoughtful, and graceful critic. "The Unwritten War" and "Writers on the Left" illuminated Civil War history and the impact of Marxism on American writing. 1/3
lead_paragraph: AARON--Daniel. The American Academy of Arts and Letters notes with sorrow the death of this incisive, thoughtful, and graceful critic. "The Unwritten War" and "Writers on the Left" illuminated Civil War history and the impact of Marxism on American writing. 1/3
